specifications.Finish: Mechanical > Bonded Bonded fabric is created by fusing two different layers into one, which improves durability. When a winter outer layer is combined with a warm lining, it enhances insulation while also supporting a structured, defined silhouette.
specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it. Knit > Double > Scuba This fabric may get wrinkles if it is folded and left for a long time, so be careful when handling or storing it.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Do not rub Do not bleach Line dry Do not tumble dry Do not iron Do not dry clean Performance UV Protection A treatment to reduce fabric exposure to UV rays through application of a UV blocking agent that absorbs or scatters UV rays. Anti-Microbial Fabric with an antibacterial effect created by inserting silver into yarns or through silver nano coating. Thermal Resistance Thermal resistance helps block the transfer of heat, keeping warmth in and cold out. It improves insulation and enhances comfort in cold weather. Brand Yarn Aeroheat EX速 Aeroheat EX速 is a heat generating polyester fiber that absorbs light to radiate thermal energy. Provides semi-permanent features of warmth and comfort with lightweight. Creora速 Creora速 is a spandex with high power and excellent heat resistance, which maintains its fabric power even setting at high temperature or re-dyeing. In particular, this offers outstanding deeper color and better fastness, dyed with disperse dye stuff. Recommended Use Dresses, Outer, Activewear, Swimwear
